# playParametersQueue

**Instance Property**

An array containing the play parameters returned from querying MusicKit.

## Declaration

```swift
var playParametersQueue: [MPMusicPlayerPlayParameters] { get set }
```

## Accessing the play parameters

- **startItemPlayParameters**: The item identified by the play parameters to play first.
- **MPMusicPlayerPlayParameters**: The MusicKit parameters that describe items to play.

items.description: The item identified by the play parameters to play first.
items.name: startItemPlayParameters

items.description: The MusicKit parameters that describe items to play.
items.name: MPMusicPlayerPlayParameters
